info.name: OptiSlip Order Edit Testing
info.description: Complete Postman collection for testing order creation, editing, and management

item.name: 1. Login (Get Token)
item.description: Login to get authentication token. Copy token from response and save as {{token}} variable in Postman environment.

item.name: 2. Create New Order

body.raw:
{
  "patientName": "John Doe",
  "whatsappNumber": "+919876543210",
  "frameDetails": "Metal frame, brown",
  "lensType": "Polycarbonate",
  "totalAmount": 5000,
  "advance": 2000,
  "balance": 3000,
  "deliveryDate": "2025-12-25",
  "note": "Rush delivery needed",
  "importantNote": "Special coating required",
  "rightEye": {
    "sph": -1.5,
    "cyl": -0.75,
    "axis": 90
  },
  "leftEye": {
    "sph": -2.0,
    "cyl": -0.5,
    "axis": 180
  },
  "addInput": "+1.00",
  "status": "pending"
}

item.description: Create a new pending order. Copy the _id from response for editing later.

item.name: 3. Get Pending Orders
item.description: Get all pending orders for the authenticated user. Copy an order _id to use in edit requests.

item.name: 4. Get Completed Orders
item.description: Get all completed orders for the authenticated user.

item.name: 5. Get Single Order by ID
item.description: Get a specific order by its _id. Replace ORDER_ID_HERE with actual order ID.

item.name: 6. UPDATE Order (EDIT)

body.raw:
{
  "patientName": "John Doe Updated",
  "whatsappNumber": "+919876543211",
  "frameDetails": "Metal frame, black (updated)",
  "lensType": "Polycarbonate - Premium",
  "totalAmount": 6000,
  "advance": 3000,
  "balance": 3000,
  "deliveryDate": "2025-12-28",
  "note": "Urgent - Updated",
  "importantNote": "Anti-glare coating added",
  "rightEye": {
    "sph": -1.75,
    "cyl": -0.75,
    "axis": 92
  },
  "leftEye": {
    "sph": -2.0,
    "cyl": -0.5,
    "axis": 180
  },
  "addInput": "+1.25",
  "status": "pending"
}

item.description: Update (edit) an existing order. Replace ORDER_ID_HERE with the order's _id. This is what the pencil icon triggers in the frontend.

item.name: 7. Mark Order as Complete
item.description: Mark a pending order as completed. Replace ORDER_ID_HERE with the order's _id.

item.name: 8. Delete Order (Soft-Delete)
item.description: Delete (soft-delete/archive) an order. Replace ORDER_ID_HERE with the order's _id. Order will be marked as archived but not removed from DB.

item.name: 9. Get All Orders (Admin Only)
item.description: Get all orders (admin only). Requires admin privileges.

variable.description: Bearer token from login. Paste token value here (without 'Bearer' prefix)
